query.statement:
INSERT INTO SAPHEE.ZCST103 ( MANDT , PJT , HNO , DOCNO , ISD , ABG , AGB , FYN , BSU , ZZBSU_B , REMARK , PRO , MDATE , MTIME , MID , MNAME , JUJ , BUJ , BLD , ATWRT , ATWTB )
